section.name: Download from sourceforge
section.p: In case you have installed a 1.0.0 release candidate please uninstall it first.
Open the Update Manager. From the Help menu choose:Software Updates -> Update Manager
The view in the buttom left has an item 'My Computer'. Expand it to the location of the expanded download.
When you reach the location you get an item WOLips. A click on it will open details in the right view. Click on the install button and follow the wizard.

section.name: Via Eclipse update manager
section.p: After download and successful install of 'WOLips 1.0.0 final' there will be an item WOLips in the update perspective.
To install WOLips trough the Update Manager create a UpdateSite bookmark for http://www.objectstyle.org/woproject/update/ and install WOLips.
